topics.summary: Dieses Thema ist hochaktuell und visuell stark umsetzbar. Avian malaria is spreading across Hawaiʻi in a way scientists didn’t fully grasp until now: nearly every forest bird species can help keep the disease alive. Researchers found the parasite at 63 of 64
topics.visualReason: Abstrakte Thematik, schwer zu visualisieren
